nodes.excerpt: ShareDocView.com lets you share documents (PDF, Word, PowerPoint) with links to get detailed analytics on who opened which doc, when and for how long. Plus you can get email leads! ⠀ Get a FREE account and ask us in the live chat about the Product Hunt deal!

localize.tagline: 分享帶有鏈接的文檔，以獲得分析和電子郵件線索。

nodes.excerpt: 🤔 Do you think you have seen everything in dating apps? Hardly! ❤️ Zodier is a new way to look for mates and it‘s already in your phone! We unite bots and dating to simplify meeting and chatting. 😻 Dating + chatbots = Zodier. This is how the Zodier starts!

localize.tagline: 在流行的信使的聊天机器人中约会。

nodes.excerpt: Soundescape is a free web application for ambient background sounds. If you struggle to concentrate while working from home, this tool is for you! Audio is rendered in 3D, and you'll never hear the exact same combination of audio twice, as everything is generated randomly.
nodes.title: Soundescape - Generative 3D audio environments for focused work
nodes.author: Maximilian Torggler

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免费的环境背景音网络应用。如果你在家工作时难以集中精力，这个工具就是为你准备的。音频是以3D形式呈现的，你永远不会听到两次完全相同的音频组合，因为一切都是随机生成的。
localize.tagline: 专注工作的生成式3D音频环境

localize.description: Soundescape是一款免費的環境背景音網絡應用。如果你在家工作時難以集中精力，這個工具就是爲你準備的。音頻是以3D形式呈現的，你永遠不會聽到兩次完全相同的音頻組合，因爲一切都是隨機生成的。

localize.tagline: 創作者無需等待就能獲得報酬的應用。

nodes.excerpt: Sell more and save time with GPT-3 generated subject lines, preview text and email content. Automate your sales with easy drag n drop emails, personalized product recommendations, cross-selling and winback automations. Attract and retain your high spenders.
nodes.title: Machine Labs - The AI marketing expert that helps you rocket your sales
nodes.author: Ailidh Forlan

localize.description: 使用GPT-3生成的主题行、预览文本和电子邮件内容，销售更多产品并节省时间。通过简单的拖放式电子邮件、个性化产品推荐、交叉销售和自动赢利来实现销售自动化。吸引并留住您的高消费人群。
localize.tagline: AI营销专家，帮你的销量扶摇直上。

localize.description: 使用GPT-3生成的主題行、預覽文本和電子郵件內容，銷售更多產品並節省時間。通過簡單的拖放式電子郵件、個性化產品推薦、交叉銷售和自動贏利來實現銷售自動化。吸引並留住您的高消費人羣。
localize.tagline: AI營銷專家，幫你的銷量扶搖直上。

nodes.excerpt: Finding what to watch, read, or eat has become too difficult. So we created Friendspire, a simpler way to find and save new favorites. 🔍 Better 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷 recommendations 🔖 Save and ➕ rate in one place 🗒️ Discover & build lists 🤝 Connect with friends
nodes.title: Friendspire 2.0 - Find better recommendations for what to watch, read or eat
nodes.author: M Dorsett

localize.description: 寻找观看、阅读或吃的东西已经变得太困难了。所以我们创建了Friendspire，一个更简单的方式来寻找和保存新的收藏夹。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推荐 🔖保存和➕率在一个地方 🗒️发现和建立列表 🤝与朋友连接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推荐，看什么，读什么，吃什么。

localize.description: 尋找觀看、閱讀或喫的東西已經變得太困難了。所以我們創建了Friendspire，一個更簡單的方式來尋找和保存新的收藏夾。🔍更好 🎥📺📚🎙️🍴🍷推薦 🔖保存和➕率在一個地方 🗒️發現和建立列表 🤝與朋友連接。
localize.tagline: 找到更好的推薦，看什麼，讀什麼，喫什麼。
